settings.author: Author
settings.title: Application Settings
settings.quality_changed: Audio quality has changed. Please restart playback.
settings.bg_notice: All background images were found on the Internet. Do you know the author? {link}

about.send_enquires: Please send any enquiries you may have to {link}.
about.title: About
about.welcome: Welcome to 24/7 online vaporwave and future funk radio station.
about.submission_form: Want to submit music for broadcast? Please use {link}.

credits.title: Credits
credits.created_by: {app} website and apps were created and are maintained by {author}.
credits.content_by: {content} belong to their respective authors. Musical content has been provided by artist and labels. If you have any copyright concerns, please let us know.

disconnected.title: Connection Lost
disconnected.connection_lost: Connection to our servers has been lost...
disconnected.click_button: Click the button below to reconnect.

delete_account.if_you_want: If you want to delete your account, please contact us on {email}
delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.will_be_deleted: You account and all associated data will be permanently deleted (favorites and like history).

mobile.description: Official Android and iOS apps are available. Please, download it and let Nightwave Plaza show you the past with the music of the future.

settings_language.title: Language Selection
settings_language.help: Want to help translate Nightwave Plaza? {link}

support.thanks: Thank you for your donations. All contributions go directly toward funding the station.
support.title: Support Us
support.rewards: Support the radio station and future updates by donating via Boosty to receive special Discord rewards!

user_favorites.title: My Favorites
user_favorites.list_empty: Your list is empty. Click the {icon} button to add songs.

user_favorites_export.title: Export Favorites
user_favorites_export.description: Export your favorites list as a CSV file. Click below to begin.
user_favorites_export.success: Export successful! Your file is ready to download.
user_favorites_export.error: Export failed. Please try again later.

user_login.type_username: Enter your username and password to sign in to the Nightwave Plaza.
user_login.title: Sign In

user_register.please_fill: Please complete all required fields in the registration form.
user_register.title: Registration

user_reset.instruction: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link.
user_reset.title: Reset Password

player_timer.title: Sleep Timer
player_timer.info: Set a timer to automatically stop playback.

errors.please_sign: Please sign in to your Nightwave Plaza account to access this feature.
errors.enter_user_pass: Please enter a username and password.

fields.username_alphadash: Username may only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
fields.email_unique: User with this email is already registered.

errors.reset_link_invalid: Password reset link is invalid or expired.

messages.reset_success: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email.
messages.reaction_tip: Song liked! Double-click the like button to add to favorites. Give it a try!
